mapper.select: select count(storage_no) from storage where project_no=#{_parameter}
mapper.update: update storage set storage_readnum = storage_readnum+1 where storage_no=#{_parameter}
mapper.delete: delete from storage where storage_no=#{storageNo} and user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.update: update storage set storage_title=#{storageTitle}, storage_content=#{storageContent}, storage_filename=#{fileName}, storage_filepath=#{filePath}, storage_filesize=#{fileSize}, storage_writeday=sysdate where storage_no=#{storageNo}
mapper.select: select count(storage_no) from storage s join ant_user a on s.user_no=a.user_no where s.project_no=#{projectNo} and a.user_name like'%'||#{searchText}||'%'
